column1: Smoque BBQ////The best brisket I have had anywhere period.  Sliced or chopped
column2: it has the right amount of smokiness
column4: and is the most tender brisket I have ever had.  Yes
column5: it does melt in your mouth and leave you wanting more.  First time here came with a group of 7 and we must have been very lucky arriving on a weekend around 5pm with a short line.  Line was pretty fast paced and yes you do have to scope out a table when walking in
column6: however I was really impressed with the staff assisting us in landing a table & making sure we were taken care of.  This place gets busy
column9: you stuff your face and you leave.  If you think Q's has great brisket
